summary: The file defines a collection of Flax modules and utilities for building a variational autoencoder (VAE) tailored for diffusion models. It includes encoder and decoder blocks, attention mechanisms, up/down‑sampling layers, and a diagonal Gaussian distribution class for latent space handling. The main autoencoder class integrates these components to encode images into a latent distribution and decode them back, supporting configurable architecture parameters and JAX‑accelerated training.
business_intent: Provide a high‑performance, JAX‑based VAE component that can be used in research and production pipelines for latent diffusion, enabling efficient encoding/decoding of images and latent space manipulation.
